data.text: Na waxatin danguxina, Dawuda yi Filisitine nɔ yɛngɛni, a yi e rayarabi, a yi yamanan ba e yii.

A mɔn yi Moyaba kaane nɔ. Na xanbi ra, a yi e karahan a e xa e sa bɔxɔni, a yi yamaan maliga lutin na. Lutin yɛ saxan yo saxan, a yi lutin yɛ singen nun a firinden muxune faxama nɛn. A yi a yɛ saxanden muxune lu e nii ra. Xabu na, Moyaba kaane yi lu Dawuda nɔɔn bun ma, e lu mudun fiyɛ.
Dawuda mɔn yi Rexobo a dii xɛmɛn Hadadeseri fan nɔ yɛngɛni, Soba mangana, Hadadeseri yi waxi Efirati baan tongo feni waxatin naxan yi.
Dawuda yi yɛngɛ so wontoro wuli keden kɛmɛ solofere suxu yɛngɛni e nun sofa wuli mɔxɔɲɛ. A yi soone birin san xanbi ra fasane bolon fɔ soo kɛmɛ ɲɔxɔndɔn a naxanye ramara.
Arami kaane to keli Damasi taani fa Soba mangan Hadadeseri malideni, Dawuda yi ne sofa wuli mɔxɔɲɛn nun firin faxa.
A yi a yamana kanne dɔxɔ Damasi taani Arami yamanani, Arami kaane yi lu Dawudaa yamarin bun, e lu mudun soɛ a yii. Dawuda na yi siga dɛdɛ, Alatala yi xunna kenla fima nɛn a ma.
Dawuda yi Hadadeseri a sofane yɛ masansan wure lefa xɛma daxine tongo, a siga e ra Yerusalɛn yi.
Manga Dawuda mɔn yi sula wuyaxi tongo Berotayi taani e nun Betaxa taani, Hadadeseri a taane.
Tohu, Xamata mangan yi a mɛ a Dawuda bata Hadadeseri a sofane birin nɔ yɛngɛni.
A yi a dii xɛmɛn Yorami rasiga Manga Dawuda ma, alogo a xa sa a xɔntɔn a nɔ sɔtɔna fe ra Hadadeseri yɛngɛni, bayo Tohu nun Hadadeseri yi yɛngɛni. Yorami yi siga xɛma seene ra e nun gbetin nun sulana.
Manga Dawuda yi ne fi Alatala ma, alo a gbeti fixɛn nun xɛmaan fi Ala ma kii naxan yi, a naxanye tongo siyane yii a naxanye nɔ:
Arami nun Moyaba nun Amonine nun Filisitine nun Amalɛkine. A mɔn yi seene fi Ala ma, a naxanye tongo yɛngɛni Rexobo a dii xɛmɛn Hadadeseri yii, Soba mangana.
Dawuda xinla sɔtɔ na kii nin, a yelin xanbini Arami kaane nɔɛ Fɔxɔ Lanbanni. A muxu wuli fu nun solomasɛxɛ faxa.
A yi yamana kanne lu Edɔn yi alogo na xa lu Dawudaa yamarin bun ma. Dawuda na yi siga dɛdɛ, Alatala yi xunna kenla fima nɛn a ma.
Dawuda yi lu Isirayila birin xun na. A yi kiti kɛndɛn sama tinxinna nin a yamaan birin yi.
Seruyaa dii xɛmɛn Yowaba nan yi sofa kuntigin na, Axiludu a dii xɛmɛn Yosafati nan yi mangana yenla ra.
Axitubaa dii xɛmɛn Sadɔki nun Abiyatari a dii xɛmɛna Aximeleki nan yi saraxaraline ra. Seraya nan yi sɛbɛli tiin na.
Bɛnaya, Yehoyadaa dii xɛmɛn nan yi Keretine nun Pɛlɛtine fɔxɔ ra, saraxaraline nan yi Dawudaa dii xɛmɛne ra.
